author: Jessica
excerpt: We’re back at week one! I seriously cannot believe it’s 2025. THIS IS NUTS. Going to miss my iced eggnog lattes! We had some basketball… And a new years eve party with friends!! Cotton candy confetti sparklers that look like confetti sprinkling down. These were so fun! Loved loved her special cup! The cotton candy […]
text: We’re back at week one! I seriously cannot believe it’s 2025. THIS IS NUTS. Going to miss my iced eggnog lattes! We had some basketball… And a new years eve party with friends!! Cotton candy confetti sparklers that look like confetti sprinkling down. These were so fun! Loved loved her special cup! The cotton candy turned it brrrright red. Ha. We did a countdown at 6:30. Then after that, we watched Wicked! So excited that it’s already streaming. The most fun babies!! Max and I stayed up until midnight. He wants to every year! The most fun thing I did was get these star streamers from amazon and hang them from the ceiling. Orange rolls for new years day. Then we went ice skating again!! This was only Jordan’s second time on the ice and he did AMAZING. He was so excited and loved it. Ready for hockey!! BFFs. The highlight might have been making snowballs though. Peekaboo. The highlight for me was the cheesecake factory, where I haven’t been in probably 10 years. Why are those thai chicken lettuce wraps so good?! We’ve been getting a good amount of snow. I wish it snowed in December though! Still on a hot chocolate kick. The kids love it. Took down all the christmas stuff. Back to hockey! And a big plate of BBQ. More basketball. I love that little pony. And more hockey! And now, back to real life and a whole new year. I feel like Emilia.
html:
We’re back at week one!

I seriously cannot believe it’s 2025. THIS IS NUTS.

Going to miss my iced eggnog lattes!

We had some basketball…

And a new years eve party with friends!!

Cotton candy confetti sparklers that look like confetti sprinkling down.

These were so fun!

Loved loved her special cup!

The cotton candy turned it brrrright red. Ha.

We did a countdown at 6:30.

Then after that, we watched Wicked! So excited that it’s already streaming.

The most fun babies!! Max and I stayed up until midnight. He wants to every year!

The most fun thing I did was get these star streamers from amazon and hang them from the ceiling.

Orange rolls for new years day.

Then we went ice skating again!!

This was only Jordan’s second time on the ice and he did AMAZING. He was so excited and loved it. Ready for hockey!!

BFFs.

The highlight might have been making snowballs though.

Peekaboo.

The highlight for me was the cheesecake factory, where I haven’t been in probably 10 years. Why are those thai chicken lettuce wraps so good?!

We’ve been getting a good amount of snow.

I wish it snowed in December though!

Still on a hot chocolate kick. The kids love it.

Took down all the christmas stuff.

Back to hockey!

And a big plate of BBQ.

More basketball.

I love that little pony.

And more hockey!

And now, back to real life and a whole new year. I feel like Emilia.
